name: Insta Collage Maker & Editor - Magic Photo Editor
name_original: Insta Collage Maker & Editor - Magic Photo Editor
description:
*Selfie & STYLE YOUR PIC & COLLAGE"

* COMBINE YOUR PHOTOS TO UNIQUE COLLAGE
* Amazing irregular collage layouts.Unique!
* Adjustable regular collage layouts
* Bbeautiful pic borders
* Amazing photo effects to apply individual photo
* Adjust border's color
* Explore your saved collages via built-in gallery
* Auto save your masterpiece to built-in gallery when tap "Save to Camera Roll"

* CAPTION & STYLE YOUR PIC & COLLAGE

* EDIT PIC & COLLAGE WITH PRO PHOTO EDITOR
* Zoom in grid to pan,pinch,rotate photo
* Pan, rotate or mirror each photo
* Rounded corners on photos
* Move photos between different grids by drag and drop
* Double tap picture to show photo edit menu
